pr_title: Add extra note about limit_key in javadocs and change the test files to match the modification

timeline.bodyText:
Editorial Nit:
Please note that the configuration of $L won't limit the number of results you get with the paginator. It only limits the number of results in each page.
timeline.author: millems

timeline.message: Add extra note about limit_key and change the test files to match the modification.
Add extra note about limit_key and change the test files to match the modification.
